blurb: NEW Online Community of Passionate People Learning Photography from National Geographic level Pros.

name: Newfoundland: Shore to Shore - A Photographic Journey
blurb:
I will be documenting my journey throughout Newfoundland via a lens to showcase this diverse island
www.nlshoretoshore.com

name: The Solstice Project
blurb: Iceland. The Midnight Sun. This June, I will capture the photographs of a lifetime in a location like no other.

name: North Woods Wildlife: Sparking Curiosity In Young Learners
blurb: Through trail camera images I intend to spark curiosity and appreciation for the natural world in students of all ages.

name: Show Me Your You - Prompt Cards for Portrait Photographers
blurb: Show Me Your You is a deck of emotive prompt cards for portrait photographers who want to take human connection to the next level.

name: Underneath We Are Women
blurb:
100 women, 100 bodies, 100 stories!
A photobook showcasing the diversity of women through honest and raw photographs.

name: Sun Salutations is a Yoga Greeting Card Company
blurb: Featuring inspiring images that support the diversity of the yoga community

name: Faces of Yoga: A Coffee Table Photo Book
blurb: Faces of Yoga is a series of uncomfortable photos of people in strange positions. The photo book will be ready for the holiday season!

name: "Angus O'Callaghan. Melbourne." 1968 - 1971
blurb: This coffee table book features Melbourne as never seen before through the eyes of an artist now 93 years old. Melbourne from 1968-1971

name: The Cubans
blurb: A book of 80 black and white  photographs, celebrating the Cuban people, their lives, and their cultures.

name: Help Publish "The Anatomy of Severe Weather"
blurb: A weather book with 200 high resolution images using clear page overlays to explain the dynamics of how and why severe weather occurs.

name: Help end youth homelessness with photography!
blurb: Kids4Cameras is running a one-week campaign to share street photography work produced by homeless and at-risk youth.

name: THE CUBA UNKNOWN: An Exploration in Times of Change
blurb: An intimate exploration of Cuba through photographs, stories, and art, from the months we spent searching for waves with Cuban surfers.

name: The Road Book 2018 - Women's Cycling Coffee Table Book
blurb: A 240 page coffee table book celebrating the 2018 women's cycling season. Full of our favourite photos from almost 100 days of racing!

name: London In Lockdown
blurb: Photographic documentary of the effects on London tourist hotspots during the Corona Virus pandemic.

name: Rumination Volume 13 DASHA Art Nude Photobook MAKE 100
blurb: Rumination Volume 13 DASHA, a beautiful Siberian model with Attitude and Ambition, don't miss this Limited Edition Photobook.

name: CASSIE Rumination Volume 12 Art Nude Photobook MAKE 100
blurb: Rumination Volume Twelve Cassie. A beautiful blonde bombshell that lit up the camera with her vivacious smile.

name: Cyanotype Photography Series -  Residency in Toronto
blurb: I will create a new series of large format cyanotype photographic images while in residence at Artscape Gibraltar Point,Toronto.

name: Wild Open Roads: A photographic journey home!
blurb: In 2016 I journeyed to my birth town of San Diego, taking over 575 negatives. I hope to develop these for my upcoming art exhibition.

name: Occurrences [reduced.]
blurb: Occurrences [reduced.] is my first gallery of minimalist photographs

name: 20 in 15 - The Lives of Artists
blurb: A fine art photobook taking a look behind the scenes at the lives of twenty artists, their creative processes and working environments.

name: Scorched Subway - A photography zine by Joshua Turner
blurb: A documentary photo-zine exploring Salford (Manchester, UK), portraying a path of discovery surrounding stereotype and a community.

name: Look, I'm wearing all the colours - a photobook
blurb: A modern love story about life with chronic illness, pain and depression, beautifully told in pictures.

name: Be Hers Be Mine
blurb: A photo book about a Swiss couple's surrogacy journey to America.

name: BANGKOK PHOSPHORS: A Photobook of a City at Night
blurb: A wandering photographic journey through the old and new streets of nocturnal Bangkok.

name: PCT People Project - The Book
blurb: A photo book featuring an ongoing portrait series of Pacific Crest Trail thru-hikers & their stories.

name: PhotoLatrie Four - Amsterdam - Lynn - Art Nude Photobook
blurb: Photolatrie, Photo Voyages and art. Lynn in Amsterdam. Netherlands.

name: New York in Quarantine: Rooftop Culture Through Crisis
blurb: A photo book about New Yorkers persevering through quarantine, photographed from my Brooklyn rooftop. 100% of profits for charity.

name: 01: CITY
blurb: My first ever photobook / zine publication. This volume explores the cities I have travelled and lived. Mainly in darkness.

name: PhotoLatrie Eleven - Madrid - Ainhoa - Art Nude Photobook
blurb: Photolatrie, Photo Voyages and Art. Ainhoa in Madrid. Spain.
